prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The Book language allows writing AI applications, agents, workflows, automations, knowledge bases, translators, and more without needing to know the technical details of AI models. It uses a markdown-based syntax and has file extension .book.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Book language, AI applications, agents, workflows, automations, knowledge bases, translators, markdown-based syntax, .book file extension
